title: Get a transfer configuration
description: Retrieves the details for a transfer configuration from the BigQuery Data Transfer Service, such as its schedule and destination.

objective.narrative: Developers need to programmatically inspect existing data transfers. This sample provides the code to retrieve all metadata for a specific transfer configuration, which is necessary for monitoring, auditing, or building automation that modifies existing transfers.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferconfig_get
regionTags.title: Get a transfer configuration
regionTags.description: Retrieves the details for a transfer configuration from the BigQuery Data Transfer Service, such as its schedule and destination.
